md:
giải nghĩa từ "lasting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Lasting (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Remaining or existing for a long time; permanent.
	+ Vietnamese: Được tồn tại lâu dài; bền vững.
	+ Example sentence: The new policy has had a lasting impact on the economy.
	+ Related words: permanent, enduring, long-lasting, persistent.
	+ Antonyms: temporary, fleeting, transitory.

* Lasting (noun)
	+ Meaning: Something that remains or exists for a long time.
	+ Vietnamese: Điều gì đó tồn tại lâu dài.
	+ Example sentence: The lasting legacy of the great leader is still remembered today.
	+ Related words: heritage, tradition, legacy, permanence.
	+ Antonyms: ephemera, transience, brevity.

Note: The word "lasting" can be used as both an adjective and a noun, depending on the context in which it is used.

  • Lasting (adjective)

  • Lasting (noun)

    • Meaning: Something that remains or exists for a long time.
    • Vietnamese: Điều gì đó tồn tại lâu dài.
    • Example sentence: The lasting legacy of the great leader is still remembered today.
    • Related words: heritage, tradition, legacy, permanence.

Note: The word "lasting" can be used as both an adjective and a noun, depending on the context in which it is used.
